name: Dutch phone regex
description: A regular expression for validating dutch (regular) phonenumbers.
content:
Dutch phone numbers regular expression

Some valid examples as how Dutch people would write down their phonenumber:
0101234567
010-1234567
010 - 123 45 67
010 1234 567
06-12345678
06 123 456 78
0111-123456
0111 123456

International notation:
+31101234567
0031101234567
+31(0) 10123 4567
+3110-1234567
003110 1234567

+316 123 456 78
+31(0)6 123 45678

+31111-123456
0031111-123456


Invalid:
06-1234-5678
An extra dash is not allowed

06 123456789
To long

06 1234567
To short

+31(06) 123 45678
Invalid optional declaration

1234567 (without regional number)

Side note:
This does not validate any special numbers like: emergency service, paid service numbers, vpn numbers, etc.
112 (emergency number)
0900-1234  (paid service numbers)
0906-12345 (paid service numbers)
0800-5555
0800-55555
author: Diederik  Lascaris
